title: Video: Braids – Lammicken
content:
This new video from Mark Webber for Braids psychedelic pop track Lammicken perfectly captures the other worldly feel emanated by the song.

Beautiful and moving at the same time, the vibrant colours and patterns morph elegantly in time to the music, creating a visual experience that is both unique and fitting. Much like finding shapes in the clouds, the viewer is encouraged to search for images and recognisable traits, with each viewing provoking new discoveries. Check out the video for Lammicken below.

BRAIDS – Lammicken from Mark Webber on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
